Package com.google.appinventor.components.scripts

Provides classes for generating information about components from the annotations and comments in their source code.

See: Description

  • Class Summary 
    Class Description
    ComponentDescriptorGenerator
    Tool to generate simple component descriptors as JSON.
    ComponentListGenerator
    Tool to generate a list of the simple component types, and the permissions and libraries (build info) required for each component.
    ComponentProcessor
    Processor for generating output files based on the annotations and javadoc in the component source code.
    ComponentProcessor.Feature
    Represents a component feature that has a name and a description.
    ComponentProcessor.Property
    Represents an App Inventor component property (annotated with SimpleProperty).
    DocumentationGenerator
    Generates user-level HTML documentation for Young Android components into a single html file.
    LangDefXmlGenerator
    Processes component source files to generate an XML file to specify a language to Codeblocks.

Package com.google.appinventor.components.scripts Description

Provides classes for generating information about components from the annotations and comments in their source code.
